message: Yeah I am going to have to go with Batman too....but not George Clooney Batman ;-)

I realized I haven't done a QOTD all week! You can blame my job being OMFGWTFBBQ busy this week. 

HOWEVER

Today's QOTD is the age old question (at least for comic book nerds): Batman or Superman?

I pick Batman because he acquired all his skill and "powers" (gadgetly-enhanced, mind you) through determination and hard work. Superman just showed up on Earth and absorbed sunlight. 

What about you?
@cym0n The movies had no standing in my decision; just comics, graphic novels and cartoons. :-D
Batman, as long as there's no bat-nipples.
